text: For Her People is a 1914 British silent drama film directed by Laurence Trimble and starring Florence Turner, Rex Davis and Franklyn Bellamy.Low p.286 ==Cast== * Florence Turner as Joan * Clifford Pembroke as Leslie Calder * Rex Davis as Tom * Franklyn Bellamy as Henry Calder * Herbert Dunsey as William Arnold * John MacAndrews as Greengrocer ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. The History of the British Film 1914-1918. Routledge, 2005. ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 drama films Category:English-language films Category:British films Category:British silent feature films Category:British drama films Category:Films directed by Laurence Trimble Category:British black-and-white films
title: For Her People
